title: SparkyLinux 2023.07 Brings Debian 13 Packages, Secure Boot
description:
Powered by Linux kernel 6.3, SparkyLinux 2023.07 brings packages from the upcoming Debian 13 “Trixie” and SparkyLinux Testing repositories.

The post SparkyLinux 2023.07 Brings Debian 13 Packages, Secure Boot appeared first on Linux Today.

title: 30 Years of Slackware: A Legacy of Stability and Power
description:
Slackware Linux turns 30, empowering users and open source community. Let’s take a moment to honor the efforts of the Slackware team.

The post 30 Years of Slackware: A Legacy of Stability and Power appeared first on Linux Today.
